website_summaries.verdict: A charger that works well in extreme conditions and comes with a  LED flashlight.
pros: Provides ease of mind, ensuring devices will work even in extreme conditions
Maintains charging abilities with everyday use
We especially love the built-in flashlight
cons: May not fully charge in all environments

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: It charges with a solar panel charger, it charged an iPhone and an iPad pretty quickly and still had charge left over, the flashlight works. However, I’m not impressed. For starters, this thing is NOT waterproof, or even water-resistant. The flap that is supposed to cover the ports does not seal or even properly cover the ports as there’s no way it fits or can be pushed into the recess it is supposed to fit in - see pics. What is the point of having a rugged power bank with three gaping holes in the side? Plus it weighs a small ton and is far too bulky to carry around when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Timbarina

customer_reviews.title: No staying power
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky - bigger isn't always better. Worked great for 4 months and then it began to not fully charge not matter how long it was plugged in. 7 months later it doesn't charge at all.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Too big and cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is awful quality. Hard to close, seal the covers. Too big and awkward. Spend a little more money on something good. Get a jackery product or anker product and put in rugged case, if rugged is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Garth McNally

customer_reviews.title: A Great Durable Battery
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, it works well to recharge my smart phone at least one full charge a day and if needed another 20 percent charge with the remaining battery life left. I charge this battery once a day and have used the flashlight on occasion. I love the fact that its durable and water proof and it has two USB ports. Personally, I prefer something more slender and sleek, however I choose this one because it is for work and being on the road all day the durability was important to me. The product looks just like the picture displayed and is shipped with plenty of bubble wrap so there is no damage while in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for charging devices, lightweight, waterproof - can't ask form much more!  Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed with this battery. I have had it for a while and used it for charging phones (work and personal), earbuds and headphones. One charge was good for a charging other devices for a while. It is quite a bit lighter than a couple other batteries I have. This one is my only waterproof battery and after this test run with devices in house, I'll be taking this battery with me when biking or any other outdoor activity since it s light and waterproof. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this a ton yet but I have to say that when I saw that it would light the light at full charge for days.... I was ready to buy it. And it would. I'm fully confident it would I let it. I'm excited to use this product in conjunction with my water resistant solar panel during camping trips and what not! The panel has been doing well charging other batteries and this one has a awesome light built right in! Sweet! The battery feels durable and safe. I'm sure I'll be using this product long into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery at the end of April. It doesn't hold a charge. I have owned plenty of external batteries and this is worst one ever. It will show one bad less of a full charge and then just die! Frustrating and useless. Maybe I got a bad one but I have no recourse at this point because after 30 days you're on your own.
customer_reviews.author: LouDReviee

customer_reviews.title: I charge my phone 8 times
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional driver and had no way to charge my Electronics. unifun work as intended I charge my phone 8 time and it still had more to give. Sorry its not waterproof and just water resistance. But I just keep it in my EDC bag just in case I get caught in the rain or the moisture from my water bottle. Not a worry here. The flashlight you must hold the button too turn on and off so accidental turn on is definitely Limited. Great charger a few of my coworker very interested get one too.
customer_reviews.author: Quiet

customer_reviews.title: It gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrific bargain having bought it on sale for $13.99. I had a converter that took power from a wall outlet to a USB port that had an electrical issue. I've had the external battery for about a month now. It stores enough power to recharge my cell phone and smart watch for about a week and I don't have to worry about having them plugged in to a wall outlet. I'm completely satisfied with my UNIFUN 10400mAh Waterproof External Battery.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: This works! Great item for survival kit!
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered this product I was a bit skeptical but satisfied. It is waterproof and the flashlight can turn on while a device is charging. This is the first rugged portable charger I've ever owned and for the price I pad it was well worth the investment! I would highly recommend this to a friend. The only reason I'm giving this 4/5 stars is because there isn't an actual marking to indicate which ports are 2.1.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvio

customer_reviews.title: Great For My Motorcycle!
customer_reviews.text: I know I purchased this quite a while ago. I have just recently been made aware that I could do product reviews. I just used this battery back up on my motorcycle ride to keep my phone battery charged as I was using the GPS feature on my phone. I do not have anywhere on my motorcycle to plug in my phone so this was a life saver. Material quality is great,battery life lasted for the whole day + and I don't know about the durability because I have not used it outdoors camping or hiking etc. All in all Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mina

customer_reviews.title: this is the 3rd one and i'd buy more when I need it
customer_reviews.text: amazing as always. and as with all battery packs one should know that you only get a bout 80% of the actual power rated out of the batteries inside of it. Just how it works. So in reality if you drained this you could refill a phone or device 2xs that has a 4000mah battery. It's rugged and perfect. I would not 100% say that it's waterproof than again I have not tried it. It's quality build for sure. this is the best one i've found for the price and for the build quality and size it's not a daily carry one it's for sure a hiking or just keep in car battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Brown

customer_reviews.title: Functional But Awkward
customer_reviews.text: This portable power pack will charge your devices, although it didn't come anywhere close to charging my iPhone five times as the description claims -- maybe three full charges -- and it's really bulky by comparison to others with a similar capacity. I like the flashlight. The 'waterproof' feature sounded cool, but the flap that goes over the USB ports has to be fully open to charge it or use it to charge something else, and it dangles in the way of the USB ports. Fortunately, I don't actually have a practical need for the power pack to be waterproof, so I ripped the flap off.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McEvilley

customer_reviews.title: Won't find much better at the price point
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe against the charger is that it is slow to charge my Samsung Galaxy S8. The flashlight is powerful and it does hold charge, but I had my S8 charging for 3 hours and it had only gone up 23%. I will be taking this to a volunteer trip to Thailand because it does work and it is extremely sturdy. It will also be monsoon season so the waterproof aspect will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Vikash Singh

customer_reviews.title: but it has survived multiple Florida rainstorms in my school backpack perfectly fine. It rally will charge your iPhone (6 in ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tested it’s waterproof ability fully yet, but it has survived multiple Florida rainstorms in my school backpack perfectly fine. It rally will charge your iPhone (6 in my case) about 6 times. And the iPad about once if I remember correctly. The light on it is really bright as well. Liked mine so much got my dad one for Father’s Day. He loves his too.
customer_reviews.author: David Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, holds charge well, good light. Great emergency battery.
customer_reviews.text: I love these e batteries. Have had several friends overseas buy them for unstable power situations. They are durable, hold power well, are quite waterproof if you use the covers provided. I wish they came in a higher amperage, but I can power 2 devices for 2 days and use the light comfortably. So I just have several of them. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Great rugged power bank
customer_reviews.text: This little guy was so good I bought another one after a successful camping trip( charging it only via external solar panel) except for one thing, the rubber “cover” over the ports broke off so it’s no longer water proof. Other than that this thing charge two iPhone Xs multiple times. Once again I only charged this power bank with a solar panel once we went camping and it lasted the whole trip(2 full days) with only minimal “recharging” with the solar panel. Oh the light is about as bright as an iPhone camera for common reference.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Partidas

customer_reviews.title: I really like this this charger
customer_reviews.text: I really like this this charger. It has lasted and continues to last without any issues. I can get about 3 full charges off a dead phone while the phone is powered off. If the phone is being used you may get 1 to 2 charges with it. I'd recommend that you turn the phone off. The device does take a long time to charge but that's to be expected. It has a very bright flashlight that has come in handy multiple times. The only complaint is the ubs port cover does come off after awhile. It has on both units that I have. Great price and highly recommended this.
customer_reviews.author: STLOUISX50

customer_reviews.title: Best mAh/$ Travel Battery out there
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and seemed to be the most cost effective travel battery out there (great ratings, and best mAh/$). The light is a nice to have, but don't see using it that often. Lost a star due to the removable cover over the charging port and USB ports - it's a bit of a pain to take off and put on in between uses. As such, I just pulled it off altogether - easy to do, and easier to use now. The other small gripe is the rubber surround, which also goes over the power button - it doesn't want to stay in place. Easy to pop back into place, but it shouldn't come loose in the first place...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This power bank holds a lot of... power.
customer_reviews.text: I also like the fact that uses standard micro usb to get charged and that comes with a led light, also with 2 USB ports to charge devices at the same time, I have not need to do that but I like the fact that there are 2 in case I ever need them 😉 .
customer_reviews.author: Francisco L.

customer_reviews.title: Tough Battery To Take On Any Adventure!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for quite some time now. The unit works as advertised. It's one of a few battery power packs I have and it's worked when I needed it. I really like the flashlight feature and I've used it on a couple of occasions where I needed light. It's bright color makes it easy to find in my bag and It's tough exterior Make it great to take outdoors and not worry about it getting damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Hubie

customer_reviews.title: I've had it over 5 years before replacing it.
customer_reviews.text: My mom first bought it and I swiped it from her when I started walking home by myself at night. Perfect for any young woman to have to make sure she has her phone charged for any emergencies and durable enough to smack someone and deal more damage to them than the item. Eventually, after close to 7 years, the charging port fell out and it was rendered useless. I then bought two more for my mother and I and we can attest, this is the best thing for trips, hikes, water parks, and walking home at night.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Built to last and holds a charge well - built-in light is a nice accessory
customer_reviews.text: Built to last and holds a charge really well! I haven't had a single problem with this durable backup battery, and the included light is a great option. I recently took it on a 2 week backpacking trip through Costa Rica and it held up like a champ. Since you can't find reliable places to charge your phone when you're traveling, it's a must have in my opinion. It's great for emergencies at home too. A+ product!
customer_reviews.author: Shaner

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work anymore, good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Recently the charger itself will not charge since the charging port became detached (falling backwards into the charger itself) and I can’t properly place a charging cable so it will charge the battery. I’m sure it has lots of life left but I can’t use it at all, so that’s why the 1 star rating. It was a great product while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Thessalonika

customer_reviews.title: it was good until..
customer_reviews.text: today I found it blown up (see pic). Something expanded inside, so it ripped 2 covers apart. I shifted black rubber a little down so one can see what / how. I did not use it too much. maybe 1-2 times per year. and it was sitting in my room, waiting for the next trip. positive thinking - it did not set my house on fire. I need to find something more reliable...
customer_reviews.author: sdacia

customer_reviews.title: Envy maker; great battery for outdoors men.
customer_reviews.text: This would make a wonderful gift for people that enjoy the security of a great battery. Very modern; works easily with a wall adapter or USB charger; the flashlight is very bright. Its a little bit of a thug, but surely a god of modern batteries. Long distance hikers like me will enjoy the comfort of MP3 players every day on the AT, CDT or PCT, and charging their phones everyday; charging their headlamps every day would enjoy this thug of a battery. I just hope it lasts; I got it today and its very simple. Thanks Unifun; great product! Envy. Big Dogcruxen.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive - But you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the beginning of the summer to charge phones during camping trips. I bought it because it was the least expensive. Its September now and it is no longer working. I have never put the waterproofing to the test but I am certain that their waterproof claim is a stretch. I wouldn't feel comfortable using this in a light rain. Also note that the charging cord that is supplied is only 7 to 8 inches long. So there is value but if you truly need a waterproof external battery pack that will last more than 7 months this may not be the battery pack for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite power bank.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several power bank in my life and this one is my absolute favorite. Waterproof, shockproof and holds a good charge. The very day I got it I tried pretty hard to break it, just to see how shockproof it really was. It passed my test with flying colors, and has been in commission for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelWic

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: One out of the 4 power LED's didn't work, most likely no quality control by manufacturer prior to shipping, but the product otherwise worked as expected, I would buy again if I couldn't find a better product for same price.
customer_reviews.author: OEF Vet

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two years
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first and was very durable but a mere two years later just stopped working out of the blue. Bummer because this was, what I thought was a rugged battery pack. I was wrong though. If your looking for something that will last more than a year or two, this isn't the battery pack for you.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Pokemon GO during its crazy period a couple years back. This battery went through some crazy Pokemon hunting adventures with me and took on some serious abuse. Even through all that, it works today and is still running strong.
customer_reviews.author: George T

customer_reviews.title: nice back up battery
customer_reviews.text: Really nice backup battery can charge a cellphone about 2-3 times a fit bit for about 2 months. It can charge two items at a time and hold a charge for a pretty long time. back up of flashlight is handy. there are 4 clue lights to let you know how much battery it has left or how much it still needs to charge. I've used it on android products,
customer_reviews.author: Kitten Under the Tree

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. I also bought another brand because it had an LED (flood) light and 20000mah (both of which I needed) but I got this one for my wife and I can tell you this is the way to go if 10,400 mah and a pretty powerful spot light works for you. The shock absorbing case is quite thick, I'm guessing this thing could take an 8' drop and keep ticking. Not sure how deep it could go underwater - maybe a foot for two, but you'll have no problem carrying it through rain or waterfalls.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cox

customer_reviews.title: Best External Pack on the Market
customer_reviews.text: No joke, this thing is the best. Costs next to nothing, gives you four full charges of a phone (from single digit battery on your phone), is (i think) waterproof, has that nice flashlight option, and really doesn't take up too much room. Sure i'd love a phone size external battery backup but those only to 1-2 charges, whereas I can get my phone 3x and my wireless headphones 3-4x before it needs to be recharged. My friend bought me one and I've since bought 3 more for other friends of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Hesch

customer_reviews.title: A Longer cord and it would be 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright light in the flashlight. Charges my phone quickly. My only complaint is that it has a very short cord both for charging it and it charging something else. It is only 6" long or so ... much to short for me to plug it into my computer and have it lay on the desk ... the first time I just left it dangle and it crashed to the floor ... now I prop it up on something ... a longer cord would make this 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Kirkendall

customer_reviews.title: The parts that matter are highly lacking. I'm sending back.
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks great, makes you confident that the inside will match the out. I fully charged this once, then used it to charge my Samsung 8+ it was only able to fully charge it 1.5 times. And it took 3 hours to get to 40% overnight for full charge. Then afterwards, it wouldn't take a charge, it sat on the charger with only the first light of the 4 battery bars blinking for the whole night and didn't charge any.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little weather proof charger device!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and kids used this while on week long trip to DisneyWorld where it rained on them the whole time, they used this to keep their phones charging in their backpacks and it works as advertised to charge multiple phones throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: scoutsout2

customer_reviews.title: but this thing is built sturdy. The only weak point to complain about is ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long, but this thing is built sturdy. The only weak point to complain about is the possibility of the rubber boot breaking off due to long usage. Other than that it works great, the light on it is very effective, and it charges at the same rate as a household charger. The pack takes a while to charge from 50%, but even at that, there still is enough power left to charge my phone almost twice. If you have bigger hands it's nice because it fits very well. Great product for the price of $15 ish dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Customer11:49

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working After 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: Had it 2 years with limited use and it stopped working altogether. Great while it lasted although the rubber sealant around the middle started coming apart early on. I bought a more expensive Anker as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J40

customer_reviews.title: Will barely charge my phone after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this item it charged my phone and still had some battery left for another charge. Unfortunately, that didn't last long and now it won't hold a charge or fully charge my phone. The flashlight button is almost impossible to find and it does not work. I don't see how this item is waterproof because you have to open up the rubber gasket to plug your cord in and then all the outlets are exposed. The color is nice but it is rather large and heavy compared to other chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for the survival kit
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a few weeks and wasn't sure at first if the size was going to be an issue. Then I found myself stuck on the side of the highway with a dead car in the middle of Detroit. Twice in one week. It was terrible. Thankfully, my cell phone was charged throughout the whole ordeal (both nights), which allowed me to get a tow, find an auto shop, book a hotel, etc. and I never had to recharge this external battery until I got back home in Saginaw. AND its convenient flashlight helped tremendously when it came to loading and unloading my car on the uhaul rented auto transport. Great product! Thank you for making it.
customer_reviews.author: Bub

customer_reviews.title: Recommended buy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable. A little heavy, but high quality. Works great for charging my phone on mission trips in Africa! Also packs enough power to run my personal fan overnight for about 6-7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The Unifun is an easy to use and hard to lose charger. Having 2 USB ports is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So ft so good. My only issue is that the light that ...
customer_reviews.text: So ft so good. My only issue is that the light that illuminates the charge meter seems to 'bleed' into the other dots. Hard to see exactly what the current charge actually is. Is apparently a design error. In any event, it has charged my devices well so far. Still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good thing. it holds up to being tough battery ...
customer_reviews.text: light is very bright. good thing. it holds up to being tough battery charger. it maybe has less than 10kmAh but it charges the phone very well. I bought 15 of these and none of the people I gave it to complained of anything. its bulky but its not a drawback.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this charger for 3 months and love it. It holds a charge for a long time and I can charge my completely dead iPhone 6s about 5-6 times before I need to recharge the unit. I have not tested to ensure this is waterproof but it does appear to be able to be water resistant. I keep it in a ziplock while hiking because I'd prefer not to find out the hard way this product won't withstand a rain storm.
customer_reviews.author: KL_1207

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This unit works exactly as described. The charging indicator lights are cool. It re-charges my iPhone 6 quickly. The only improvement could be the material used for the flap that covers the ports. The material is not pliable enough to provide a good seal and I questions it's ability to repel moisture. Highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Woodtick Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Used it only 1 time, charged my daughter's kindle fire in record time. I plugged it in to charge, and now I only get one blue flashing light the entire time it's plugged in. When I unplug it to use it it has no power, not even enough to turn on the L.E.D. light. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: glenneller

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and have had it for almost 2 years. Over time the battery takes longer to charge. I haven't ever had it submerged but it definitely is water resistant. The only reason I give it a 4 star review is because it takes about 8 hours to get charged after having it about a year. It does hold a charge for a while, though. Overall I would recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker DeLoach

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my Android phone. It takes hours to charge up even with a fast charging cord and then can only charge my phone about one and a half times. But on the other hand it is very sturdy. I just had bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Max

customer_reviews.title: Good unit. Sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has held up very well, does what it is supposed to with no issues. I charge my cellphone with it, run my tablet off of it, charge my GoPro camera and its remote with this, and have even run my GPS units off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gu

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 5 years of owning it!
customer_reviews.text: I still use this charger all the time! It charges my phone in about 3 hours. It charges my phone at least 3 times before I need to charge it. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: dac-mac

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. well protected design - dont have to worry about it being exposed to anythign if you put it in your bag or purse when we carry it. Many battery packs give you an extra carry case or cover to protect - but this comes well protected 2. the light is good and bright. nice design Cons: a little bulks and bit expensive for 10400mAh capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Dev Nair

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built.
customer_reviews.text: It holds a good charge, almost 3 for my galaxy s7 at a good fast charge rate. It feels fairly rugged and it looks like the rubber caps for the plugs would keep water out. I did appreciate the brighter than average flashlight, as well as a more directional angle to it.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Still working good after 3 years (with minor repair)
customer_reviews.text: Bought in May 2017 and it's still working great as of August 2020. Mine has a faulty design where it gives the flashlight LED too much voltage. You'll know this if your flashlight starts flickering after 10-15 minutes of use. I soldered a small resistor inline to the LED (either terminal is fine) and it works great for hours on end now. The flashlight will easily run for over 5 days 24/7 on a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a couple of years
customer_reviews.text: Tend to forget about it until bad weather threatens to cut my electricity. Winter storm in Spartanburg SC this weekend. Didn't have to use it but glad I have it. Think I will start keeping it in my motorcycle saddle bags.
customer_reviews.author: Allen D. Vestal

customer_reviews.title: the flash light isnt the brightest but is good enough for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these about 3 years ago. the flash light isnt the brightest but is good enough for my needs.the rubber gripping is excellent and helps when u need a free hand. note5 recharges 3 time from dead. mine got stolen so i ordered a new one i liked it so much. dont pick at dark rubber it won't go back in. survived several drops and is a great flashlight in emergencies like atornado as the battary life is huge for the flashlight. For the price this product is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Yow

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this power bank. Very sturdy. Can recharge my phone or ipad multiple times. Flash light on it is actual pretty bright. It takes a while to fully recharge the power bank but its worth the wait because in case of an emergency you have that extra power.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: It was an awesome buy though
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for me, as I carry it with me in my backpack all the time. The only thing I would suggest to the company is to find a way to make the recharging time a little shorter. It takes all night to charge this battery. It was an awesome buy though. And having a flashlight with me has came in handy a couple of times. I would also suggest to anyone buying a external battery to buy a big one (min of 10,000 mAh) because even if you forget to charge it will last 4-5 times of charging a large cell phone battery.
customer_reviews.author: Chefbujak

customer_reviews.title: This device is the BEST external charger I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use when ever I needed power on the go but I also wanted to be prepared for future power outages. This device is the BEST external charger I've ever owned! It works exactly as it should and its tough as nails! I ended up using it everyday at my work to charge my Bluetooth speaker. It lasts days without charge when powering my bluetooth speaker and will charge my Phone to 100% 5 times over (just a guess, test never performed). Don't look any further for an external charger, this is what your looking for!
customer_reviews.author: James Polizotti

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a long trip and it fulfilled all my needs when power outlets weren't available. And it always had plenty of power to spare. The LED is somewhat anemic, but could be useful in many situations. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SameOldStoryTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Great back up battery
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I can charge my Samsung Galaxy S4 3-4 times before I need to recharge it. My Asus Memo Pad can charge once, but that is what I expected. Sometimes, I go to assemblies and conventions where I am using my tablet to look up information as well as to take notes, the battery is often dying about mid-afternoon. Now, I can boost it during the lunch break and it will last the rest of the day, or I can plug it in and use the tablet while still on charge.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas St. Amand

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first charger and I love it. It is a bit bigger than some, but has more options. I didn't have to use the flashlight, but it does work fine. I used it on the plane and at my destination to charge my Kindle; I also charged my phone 3 times. After all that it still had plenty of charge left (it just went down 1 light).
customer_reviews.author: Clede O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Nice orange color
customer_reviews.text: Nice orange color, rugged look, but a bit bigger than my other one. Not that heavy though. I love it bcoz of the powerful flashlight and the rugged look. I can bring it anywhere and not worry about breaking or dropping it bcoz it's made of rubber. I don't intend to get it wet but if it does I hope that it will pass the test.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $15 i got it for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for here. One of the better of the cheap power banks. I've gone through a lot of power banks and this is a pretty decent one. This is better used for long days where you know ahead of time you'll need some extra battery life. I would not trust this to sit in a car or backpack to rely on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I took it to Yosemite and camping a ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I took it to Yosemite and camping a several times all ready. It charges my S4 fast. I can charge my phone up to 4 times. I also don't let my phone get below 25 % battery power. The flashlight is bright enough. Its not super bright like my headlamp. My son did drop this into a puddle and it still works. My only gripe is you cant charge your phone and the external battery at the same time. Unless I'm doing something wrong. But I would recommended this external battery..
customer_reviews.author: rebelpc209

customer_reviews.title: Charges a little slower than most
customer_reviews.text: Charges relatively slower than other portable charges I have used, but solid design and charge capacity with light utility bring it to 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ron T.

customer_reviews.title: Over two years and still saving the day
customer_reviews.text: Had this over two years now and still going strong. I rarely use the flashlight but every so often it comes in super handy. Charges really well and last more charges that you would need to worry about before recharging it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Q

customer_reviews.title: I HIGHLY recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: my husband works in the field and is one of those guys that tends to drop things and uses his phone for work this was a saving grace he loved it from the time he opened the box till today and has used and needed it on many occasions I HIGHLY recommend this item. my husband a year later says this was the best gift I ever bought him. thanks
customer_reviews.author: BellaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I am very destructive of most electronics
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I am very destructive of most electronics, phones, cameras and all sorts of chargers. This I have not broken. It has been dropped on rocks and concrete, walked upon and dropped on my muddy driveway, most of all it has survived being hauled around in my purse. It works, it is often used by teens with me as well as myself and I intend to buy more. The light is bright and turns on easily if you read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Ljc

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great hold for charges
customer_reviews.text: Love this when on the go or traveling and awesome with durability as I have a toddler that loves to play with it. Love it so much we have 2 of them. Definitely a item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee C

customer_reviews.title: I like this power bank very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this power bank very much. I can recharge my phone several times off of it. It charges fully overnight and serves me very well for days as I use my phone's gps for work. I do like the orange color and the rugged look. The flashlight is a nice feature which I use regulary bc the power bank is always within reach. I would recommend this to a friend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: stelachris

customer_reviews.title: It came in really handy as we used it pretty much everywhere we went
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I brought this with us to Australia. It came in really handy as we used it pretty much everywhere we went. A bit bulky but we just packed it into our day bag. Dropped it a few times with no issues (A recent drop caused the Unifun center piece to fall out but I just popped it back in and its fine). Sometimes when I cant find my flashlight, I use this to walk the dogs at night.
customer_reviews.author: D. Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Badass little battery charger. I use it to charge my phone and my Bluetooth speaker when I'm camping/hiking. Haven't run out of battery yet. I charge it about every 5-6 days when it gets to one bar. (It has four little bars that show battery life.) I charge my phone at night so I don't usually use it to charge my phone all the way, just to keep it alive until I'm done hiking or working. Flashlight works great, dual charging works good. Not a great speed charger, but that's not what I bought it for so it doesn't affect me. Shock and water proof enough for me, and I'm pretty hard on things. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Mac daddy

customer_reviews.title: Four battery rescues in three weeks.  Glad I had it.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Rescued a couple phones and one Kindle (twice) during recent 3-week vacation. The rescues it performed made it totally worth toting it around. Love the bright orange color. Easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence WalshTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: So, I wrote a nice review and loved it til this morning when it suddenly burst into flames (while charging), and caused damage to the chair it was charging on, as well as the rug and carpet. Ugh. Well, I'm not sure if this power bank did or did not have a safety feature to turn off at max charge or if it's just faulty material degrading after a year+ of usage.
customer_reviews.author: James Soe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this item broke within one month of purchase. The plug for the micro-USB charge cord broke, one of the sockets contact tabs got folded/bent and I couldn't charge the battery anymore. This has rendered the unit useless and I cannot fix it myself. . I was hoping to exchange it, I liked the unit while it worked. There is no way to exchange the item apparently. Very frustrating. (Particularly since it actually broke during the first 30 days.)
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this thing! It's not the most attractive, being a female, but I don't care bc it works so well. It will charge my iPhone 6s 4 times before I have to charge the external charger itself. I bring it with me when we're on the boat all day and won't be around a charger. I have never missed out on any Kodak moments due to my phone being dead and that is awesome. The only downside is that it's not the best looking charger out there, but it works great and water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Also keep in mind the fine print on what "waterproof" means -- it will do ...
customer_reviews.text: The one wrinkle to keep in mind with this battery is that it takes a long time for it to fully charge -- it can take 12-14 hours, though typically it has taken about 10 for me. Also keep in mind the fine print on what "waterproof" means -- it will do fine if it gets rained on or spilled on, but not if you drop it in a swimming pool or bathtub. Those caveats in mind, this has proven a reliable backup power source for our phones and other devices. I'm glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I like this charger
customer_reviews.text: I like this charger. I was disappointed with the first one I ordered because the flashlight didn't work. Send it back, had my refund the same day it was picked up and reordered. Next one was here in two days. I charged it overnight. Ran my kindle down to 10%. Put the charger on it and watched it recharge my kindle as i used it. Also the flashlight is very bright. A little heavy but worth it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Wang

customer_reviews.title: portable charging power
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the cover you have to remove to access the USB ports for charging, it seems to be in the way a lot. It is a bit heavy and bulky, you wouldn't want to carry it in your pocket. It charges my iPhone ok. For the money it will do me, I don't like it as well as the unit it is replacing which had a meter that would tell the exact amount of remaining charge, but I'll get by with this item.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Dual charging port is super handy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Dual charging port is super handy, cover fits nicely and keeps the ports protected. Flashlight is quite bright, handy in a pinch. Battery lasts quite a while. I'm 8 months in and probably 100-150 charge cycles at this point and it'll still get me through 3+ full phone charges.
customer_reviews.author: Kier

customer_reviews.title: Dude, this thing is legit. Does a solid ...
customer_reviews.text: Dude, this thing is legit. Does a solid three charges of my android and my iPhone (as in charging it once will charge one of my devices three times) and my kid loves tossing it around. Has paid for itself many times!! Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Purpose Portable Charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable charger for my 10-year old son. He loves the color and the flashlight. He does not let this charger out of his sight. With the many different ports, he can charge his Apple and Sony products with this device. The bright orange color and the weight of the charger makes it easy for him to keep up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money
customer_reviews.text: My buddy swears by his, six I bought one. A little on the cheap side - the plug cover broke off pretty quickly on my friend's charger, compromising the waterproof-ness. Mind's good so far and holds a charge well. I think "water-resistant" would be more accurate. Not about to submerge it to find out!
customer_reviews.author: High Standards for Online Purchases

customer_reviews.title: Superior Build quality and awesome for my iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this power supply for long days in the tree stand or hunting blind or just to have on family vacations. After sharing my iPhone 6S 3x, I have yet to recharge it and it's still showing full battery. Very simple to use and the built in LeD light is very convenient when needed. For the price, I was extremely impressed with the build quality and the feel. Very solid and very happy that I went with this model after researching battery backups for my phone for a few nights. Buy this, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: StinceBuilt

customer_reviews.title: Getting prepared
customer_reviews.text: Needed a water proof, rugged power bank with a light and so far, this product has been perfect. The objective was to have these needs as part of a go bag, and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: battery works, flashlight does not
customer_reviews.text: It works. It will charge my phone at least a couple times before having to be recharged. The flashlight worked one time - then it no longer works. So, it's a 3 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DSC

customer_reviews.title: The portable battery works perfectly. The battery maintains a ...
customer_reviews.text: The portable battery works perfectly. The battery maintains a charge for a long period of time. At various times I've used it to power my laptop, Microsoft Surface, Samsung Galaxy Tablet, and MacBook Pro. The very powerful LED light is an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Incredible charging capacity!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I got this on sale and it's pretty awesome! I plugged in my phone at 14%. Screenshots attached of when I plugged it in and when it was fully charged. Keep in mind I was using my phone while it was charging on and off. The charger has a four light indicator to let yoy know what charge it is holding. 4 lights 100%. After my phone wS completely charged it was still at 4 lights! I could charge at least four phones! The case is awesome and sturdy. The flashlight is definitely bright enough. Great item for campi g or boating! I will get another when it goes on sale again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Raiser

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and durable and the light is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé LOVED this. He was always worried about his phone dying on the road until I got this. He loves it! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Powerful light doesn't work other than that, it's way too bulky and I doubt it's waterproof at all total rip. And of course it's more trouble than it's worth to send it back. Thanks again China
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Cheap !!! Works GREAT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but your gonna have to go through some cords to find one that it will actually work with some work perfectly and others work when they want to probably cause its cheap gas station ones. The cable it comes with works perfectly but its a lil short like 6" short. Besides that its awesome !!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheHop81

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received March 8th and already quit charging phone April 19th Bad purchase. UPDATE: Was given free replacement. New unit seems to be operating correctly. Will have to give it some time as the original one did last a full month before problem. Definitely appreciate the quick response and replacement of non functional unit.
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I was nice while it lasted, stopped working after about three months of having product. never exposed to water.
customer_reviews.author: Aurey Correia

customer_reviews.title: worked great all though a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Got this In Oct. 2015, worked great all though a little heavy. As of March 2, 2015 it will no longer take a charge and is DOA.Made sure the battery was brought down to zero before I put it on charge again. Never thought it would only work 6 months. Return policy is 30 days only. No way to contact the seller to talk about the issue. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work good, charged my Samsung Galaxy S5 from about 30% ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work good, charged my Samsung Galaxy S5 from about 30% to 100% in short order. It didn't lose much of it's own charge if any at all while doing this. I turned on the flashlight and it worked good as well, but seemed to turn off a little hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. Not sure how I lived without it. This will charge my phone everyday for almost a week. Is a little bulky, but if it falls at least you know it won't break. You can charge two devices at the same time, plus it also has a flashlight. The only down fall is, is that it does take 6-8 hours to charge. :/ And while it's charging you can't use it to charge your other device. i.e. Your phone but once it's good to go, you're set. Now you can charge your phone anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Becca_zoegirl

customer_reviews.title: NOT water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust the water resistance of this. I have had it about 4 months and I accidentally spilled water with the plug part completely closed. Now, it won't turn on. And there was water droplets inside of the plug cover. Other than that, it is a good product but, they shouldn't advertise water resistance when it isnt...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica!

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my brother who frequently rides his bike out in the forest where he is hours away from power. He loves it and says it charges is phone extremely fast. Since it was a gift I can't give any specifics but I do see my brother carry it with him wherever he goes and since he's a minimalist I think it says a lot about the product to have it always on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Robertson

product_meta.title: Unifun 10400mAh Waterproof External Battery Power Bank Charger with Strong LED Flashlight and Strap Hole for Tablets, Smartphones and 5V Devices
feature_bullets: Creative design: Waterproof (IP66 rating), dustproof, anti-shock, skid resistance. Perfect for campers, hikers, skiers, construction workers, and many other outdoor enthusiasts.
10400mah of capacity charges all iPhone 5 times or large-capacity phones like the Galaxy S4 more than three times.
Dual USB output: Fast charge two devices simultaneously (USB Output 1: 5V/1.0A, USB Output 2: 5V/2.1A). Input 5V/2A
4 Integrated LED Power status indicator. Auto power-off no energy loses when not in use. Reliable lithium polymer core ensures quality and supplies up to 1000 lifetime charge cycles
Package include:1xUnifun 10400mAh Heavy Duty Waterproof LED Torch Power Bank,1xMicro USB charge cable ,1xUser guide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,179 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
